name: DROP (Discrete Reasoning Over Paragraphs)
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A reading comprehension benchmark requiring discrete reasoning over paragraphs.
notes: Questions necessitate operations like addition, counting, or sorting over passages, challenging models beyond simple extraction. Answers can be numbers, dates, or text spans, sometimes lists or yes/no. Human performance is around 96%, while initial models achieved approximately 32.7% F1 score.
